backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with contact form submission/retrieval and user profile management, protected by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to expand the Techniques page with 9 additional organic farming technique cards, each with enriched structured content, responsive grid layout, and scroll animations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key features of each page and component in the Agro Crops application.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Agro Crops React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app file setting up TanStack Router with auth-guarded routes, a global CartContext provider, and a shared Layout with Header and Footer wrapping all pages.
Reusable wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger CSS animations (fadeIn, slideUp, zoomIn, etc.) when the section scrolls into view, with configurable delay and threshold.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Agro Crops brand, a full navigation quick-links list, and a contact section with clickable email, phone, and location details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with desktop/mobile navigation, a cart sheet with checkout flow (cart → customer details → success), and logout functionality using session storage for auth state.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Renders a row of buttons to switch between English, Hindi, and Marathi languages using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart and wishlist state with add, remove, update quantity, clear, and wishlist toggle operations, plus derived cartCount and cartTotal values.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context that manages the active language (en/hi/mr), persists it to localStorage, and exposes a translation lookup function `t` with English fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor via React Query, using the current Internet Identity; invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and expose identity and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a useSubmitContact mutation hook that calls the backend actor's submitContact method and invalidates the contacts query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Poppins and Merriweather fonts, defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, a green-themed OKLCH CSS variable palette with dark mode, and keyframe animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero section, stats grid, mission/vision cards, and a team section displaying member names, roles, and contact info using i18n translations.
frontend/src/pages/Cattle.tsx: Displays detailed information about farm animals (cow, buffalo, goat, poultry, sheep) including breeds, feed, health, diseases, housing, productivity, and market value.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides a contact form that submits messages via Formspree for email delivery and optionally persists them to a backend actor, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Equipment.tsx: Lists farm equipment items with details like category, specs, usage, and tutorial links, supporting search/filter by category and expandable detail views.
frontend/src/pages/Farm.tsx: Shows a searchable crop guide table with season, soil type, benefits, and tips for various crops, plus a list of organic farming benefits, using i18n translations.
frontend/src/pages/GovernmentSchemes.tsx: Displays a detailed list of Indian government agricultural schemes (PM-KISAN, PMFBY, KCC, NMSA, etc.) with descriptions, benefits, eligibility, and links to official websites.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: The landing page showcasing organic farming benefits, region-specific crops, government schemes overview, and future scope sections with navigation links to shop and techniques pages.
frontend/src/pages/OtpVerification.tsx: A 4-digit OTP verification page that validates a demo OTP ('1234'), sets session authentication on success, and redirects to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: An e-commerce shop page listing organic products (seeds, fertilizers, etc.) with search, category filtering, cart, and wishlist functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: A signup page that collects a 10-digit mobile number, stores it in sessionStorage, and navigates to the OTP verification page.
frontend/src/pages/Techniques.tsx: React page displaying organic farming techniques (composting, pest control, crop rotation, etc.) with expandable cards showing steps, benefits, tools, and pro tips. Uses Lucide icons and a language context for i18n.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Centralized translation strings for English, Hindi, and Marathi covering all pages and UI elements in the application. Used by the LanguageContext to support multi-language switching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes a helper to remove sensitive params from the URL without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom green/brown color tokens, typography/container-queries/animate plugins, custom fonts (Poppins, Merriweather), border radii, box shadows, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 43) describing the Agro Crops organic farming website's architecture, existing features, known issues (cart, auth redirect, contact form), and multi-page/multi-language design notes.
